text: Kandi iyo bahuye n’abemeye baravuga bati “Twaremeye” (ko Muhamadi ari Intumwa y’ukuri kandi yahishuwe mu gitabo cyacu cya Tawurati) . Nyamara bakwiherera bari bonyine bakabwirana bati “Ese murabaganirira ibyo Allah yabahishuriye (ihanurwa ry’Intumwa Muhamadi muri Tawurati) kugira ngo bazabibashinjishe kwa Nyagasani wanyu? Ese nta bwenge mugira?”
